text: Nde nza phorgap guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi gu mbigi, nza nde phorga kav, Fhe Bakɨme buna vhuueŋ bun nzuav, nza wari wo mba nzuav ŋaara mbatɨga muuŋgi, nde ne kaŋgi. Nza khaŋ tɨga havhargiap, raa gu maan mba ŋaara muuŋgi. Nza khueŋ nzuav maaŋ muuŋgi, nza mban wari ganɨngeŋ suaŋv simtɨgar nden nɨɨŋ thagi.
